select cri.id, cri.student_id, cri.elective_id, cri.course_id, cri.content, cri.status, cri.reason, cri.audit_date, si.name as studentName, si.images as studentImages, sei.course_date, sei.start_time, sei.end_time, ci.name as courseName, ci.address, si.name as staffName, si.images as staffImages, ti.name as tieName, mi.name as majorName from course_reserve_info cri left join student_info si on (si.id = cri.student_id) left join schedule_elective_info sei on (sei.id = cri.elective_id) left join course_info ci on (ci.id = cri.course_id) left join left join staff_info si on (si.id = ci.staff_id) left join tie_info ti on (ti.id = ci.tie_id) left join major_info mi on (mi.id = ci.major_id) where 1 = 1
AND si.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{courseReserveInfo.studentName},'%')
AND ci.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{courseReserveInfo.courseName},'%')
AND mi.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{courseReserveInfo.majorName},'%')
order by sei.course_date desc
